mapper.select: SELECT M.ID, M.PW, MF.FILENUM, MF.FILENAME FROM MEMBER M LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER_FILE MF USING(ID) WHERE ID = #{id} AND PW = #{pw}
SELECT FILENUM, ID, FILENAME, ORINAME FROM MEMBER_FILE WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT ID FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (ID, PW, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, GENDER, JOINDATE, USERTYPE, BLACKLIST) VALUES(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{gender}, NOW(), 1, 0)
INSERT INTO MEMBER_FILE (FILENUM, ID, FILENAME, ORINAME) VALUES(NULL, #{id}, #{fileName}, #{oriName})

INSERT INTO RESTAURANT (ID, CATEGORYNUM, BUSINESSNUM, ADDRESS, POSTCODE, DETAILADDRESS, EXTRAADDRESS, INTRODUCTION, PARKINGCHECK, KIDCHECK) VALUES(#{id}, #{categoryNum}, #{businessNum}, #{address}, #{postCode}, #{detailAddress}, #{extraAddress}, #{introduction}, #{parkingCheck}, #{kidCheck})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET BUSINESSOK = 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WISHLIST (WISHNUM, RESTAURANTNUM, ID, CATEGORYNUM) VALUES (NULL, #{restaurantNum}, #{id}, #{categoryNum})
mapper.select: SELECT W.ID, W.CATEGORYNUM, R.RESTAURANTNUM, R.ID, R.RESTAURANTNAME, R.ADDRESS FROM WISHLIST W LEFT OUTER JOIN RESTAURANT R USING (RESTAURANTNUM) WHERE W.ID = #{id} ORDER BY WISHNUM DESC;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id} AND PW = #{pw}
